fullText:
Marked for Death

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Con 13, revenant, ability to mark a foe
Benefit: When you deal the necrotic damage from your dark reaping racial power to a target, other enemies marked by you take necrotic damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376, page(s) 41.
name: Marked for Death
